name: OneSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen light”
”Alexa, turn off kitchen light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
OneSmart Home can control different type of OneSmart lighting controllers via voice commands such as touch switches, sockets, lamps etc.
Users are required to link the OneSmart Home user account with the skill for first time.
In order to experience better voice control performance, please specify clear name for each device in the OneSmart Home App like "Kitchen light", "bedroom light", "table lamp" etc.
